RETURNDATA.OVERVIEW_CONTENT: By using projects hierarchy you can organize projects in a hierarchy tree , that you can collects the projects which are related to each other under a specific level or node and this level could be a child from another level, it is just an organization chart for projects.

ITEM_DATA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION:
To get the project level details , navigate in the tree at the left hand side till you find the required level , select it and then press the button " Get Element " at the bottom of the tree .
Note : - In this tree you can just get the details of the level not the project. - In the tree the level node appears in black color but project appears in red color as you see in the picture.

To add a new project level, first press 'new project level' button as shown in the picture then enter the level details : select level parent if exist, enter the level name and description , then press the add button, you will find the level added to the tree.

To delete a project level, select the required level from the tree and then press the button " Get Element " at the bottom of the tree then press the delete button , the level will be deleted from the tree.
Note: You can not delete the level if it has previous relations with projects, you should remove any projects associated with it before delete.

To add a project to project level , select a project level from the tree then press the " Get Element " button, at the section of assigned projects select a project from the combo box and then press the add project button at the bottom of the section.

To remove a project(s) from project level , select a project level from the tree then press the " Get Element " button, at the section of assigned projects select the project (s) from the grid and then press the remove project button at the bottom of the section.
